code: import axios from'axios';export var setLoadingInterceptor=function setLoadingInterceptor(_ref){var showLoading=_ref.showLoading,hideLoading=_ref.hideLoading;axios.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(!(req.data instanceof FormData))showLoading();return req;},function(error){hideLoading();return Promise.reject(error);});axios.interceptors.response.use(function(res){hideLoading();return res;},function(error){hideLoading();return Promise.reject(error);});};export default setLoadingInterceptor;
